title.description: The title of the website or article

url.description: The URL of the website or article

is_active.description: Whether the link is active or not

is_paywall.description: Whether the link is behind a paywall or not

type.description: the type of link, either an article or a bookmark

coauthors.description: a comma separated list of the coauthors of the article

keywords.description: A comma separated list of keywords

representative_image.description: The path to main image of the article

archive_url.description: The URL of the internet archive of the article

archive_path.description: The path of the offline archive of the article

date_published.description: The date the article was published

date_accessed.description: The date the link was accessed

word_count.description: The word count of the article
